segments.text: I am observing a peculiar kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands by the sink, completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense, it's almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, the sink is utterly overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streams over the edge in a continuous, relentless sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring onto the cabinets and forming a wide puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her foot is actually standing right in the growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly astonished by her unawareness of the immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to a very slippery situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess alone will be substantial to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the water damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR
